name: BRAVERY (itch)
description:
First-person adventure story about Mawar, who has been kidnaped together with her adoptive parent, Pak Pandir and Mak Andeh. The slave trader has kept them locked in an old dungeon.

Mawar must find a way out of the dungeon while avoiding the patrolling guard in order to free herself and her adoptive parents.  

Would you aid Mawar in escaping the dungeon?
